verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> Now when all this was finished כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise יָצְא֨וּ <WH3318> went out כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> all Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֮ <WH4672> that were present לְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> to the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> of Judah וַיְשַׁבְּר֣וּ <WH7665> in pieces הַמַּצֵּב֣וֹת <WH4676> the images וַיְגַדְּע֣וּ <WH1438> and cut down הָאֲשֵׁרִ֡ים <WH842> the groves וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <WH5422> and threw down אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠בָּמוֹת <WH1116> the high places וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֞ת <WH4196> and the altars מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֧ה <WH3063> out of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וּבְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> in Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> also and Manasseh עַד־ <WH5704> until לְכַלֵּ֑ה <WH3615> until they had utterly destroyed וַיָּשׁ֜וּבוּ <WH7725> returned כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> them all Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לַאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <WH272> to his possession לְעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5892> into their own cities ס

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <WH5975> appointed יְחִזְקִיָּ֡הוּ <WH2396> and Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> מַחְלְק֣וֹת <WH4256> the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> of the priests וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <WH3881> and the Levites עַֽל־ <WH5921> by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֞ם <WH4256> after their courses אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> every man כְּפִ֣י <WH6310> according עֲבֹדָת֗וֹ <WH5656> to his service לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and Levites לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for burnt offerings וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> and for peace offerings לְשָׁרֵת֙ <WH8334> to minister וּלְהֹד֣וֹת <WH3034> and to give thanks וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <WH1984> and to praise בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH8179> in the gates מַחֲנ֥וֹת <WH4264> of the tents יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God ס

וּמְנָת֩ <WH4521> portion הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> [He appointed] also the king's מִן־ <WH4480> at רְכוּשׁ֜וֹ <WH7399> of his substance לָעֹל֗וֹת <WH5930> for the burnt offerings לְעֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> burnt offerings הַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> [to wit] for the morning וְהָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> and evening וְהָ֣עֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> and the burnt offerings לַשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <WH7676> for the sabbaths וְלֶחֳדָשִׁ֣ים <WH2320> and for the new moons וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <WH4150> and for the set feasts כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Moreover he commanded לָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> that dwelt יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem לָתֵ֕ת <WH5414> to give מְנָ֥ת <WH4521> the portion הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and the Levites לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> might יֶחֶזְק֖וּ <WH2388> that they might be encouraged בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְכִפְרֹ֣ץ <WH6555> came abroad הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> And as soon as the commandment הִרְבּ֤וּ <WH7235> in abundance בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> the firstfruits דָּגָ֗ן <WH1715> of corn תִּיר֤וֹשׁ <WH8492> wine וְיִצְהָר֙ <WH3323> and oil וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <WH8393> and of all the increase שָׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <WH4643> and the tithe הַכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of all לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> they in abundantly הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <WH935> brought

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> And [concerning] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and Judah הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֮ <WH3427> that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> of Judah גַּם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֗ם <WH1992> in מַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> the tithe בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> of oxen וָצֹ֔אן <WH6629> and sheep וּמַעְשַׂ֣ר <WH4643> and the tithe קָֽדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> of holy things הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <WH6942> which were consecrated לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God הֵבִ֕יאוּ <WH935> they also brought in וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> and laid עֲרֵמ֥וֹת <WH6194> heaps עֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH6194> heaps ס

בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <WH7992> In the third הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <WH2490> they began הָעֲרֵמ֖וֹת <WH6194> of the heaps לְיִסּ֑וֹד <WH3245> to lay the foundation וּבַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> [them] in the seventh כִּלּֽוּ׃ <WH3615> and finished ס

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> and the princes וַיִּרְא֖וּ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲרֵמ֑וֹת <WH6194> the heaps וַֽיְבָרֲכוּ֙ <WH1288> they blessed אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

וַיִּדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> questioned יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and the Levites עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הָעֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH6194> concerning the heaps

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about עֲזַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH5838> And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> priest הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the chief לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house צָד֑וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> him and said מֵהָחֵ֨ל <WH2490> Since [the people] began הַתְּרוּמָ֜ה <WH8641> the offerings לָבִ֣יא <WH935> to bring בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אָכ֨וֹל <WH398> to eat וְשָׂב֤וֹעַ <WH7646> we have had enough וְהוֹתֵר֙ <WH3498> and have left עַד־ <WH5704> with לָר֔וֹב <WH7230> plenty כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD בֵּרַ֣ךְ <WH1288> hath blessed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <WH3498> and that which is left אֶת־ <WH853> הֶהָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> [is] this great store הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> and this ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> commanded יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah לְהָכִ֧ין <WH3559> to prepare לְשָׁכ֛וֹת <WH3957> chambers בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּכִֽינוּ׃ <WH3559> and they prepared

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> And brought in אֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּרוּמָ֧ה <WH8641> the offerings וְהַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֛ר <WH4643> and the tithes וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> and the dedicated בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> [things] faithfully וַעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> charge נָגִיד֙ <WH5057> [was] ruler [כֹּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֣הוּ <WH3562> Conaniah ק) הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> the Levite וְשִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> and Shimei אָחִ֖יהוּ <WH251> his brother מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <WH4932> [was] the next

וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <WH3171> And Jehiel וַ֠עֲזַזְיָהוּ <WH5812> and Azaziah וְנַ֨חַת <WH5184> and Nahath וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֜ל <WH6214> and Asahel וִֽירִימ֤וֹת <WH3406> and Jerimoth וְיוֹזָבָד֙ <WH3107> and Jozabad וֶאֱלִיאֵ֣ל <WH447> and Eliel וְיִסְמַכְיָ֔הוּ <WH3253> and Ismachiah וּמַ֖חַת <WH4287> and Mahath וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah פְּקִידִ֗ים <WH6496> [were] overseers מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> under the hand [כָּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3562> Conaniah ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8096> and Shimei אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother בְּמִפְקַד֙ <WH4662> at the commandment יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH5838> and Azariah נְגִ֥יד <WH5057> the ruler בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְקוֹרֵ֨א <WH6981> And Kore בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יִמְנָ֤ה <WH3232> of Imnah הַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> the Levite הַשּׁוֹעֵ֣ר <WH7778> the porter לַמִּזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> toward the east עַ֖ל <WH5921> over נִדְב֣וֹת <WH5071> [was] over the freewill offerings הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> to distribute תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> the oblations יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6942> appoint הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> and the most

וְעַל־ <WH5921> Under יָד֡וֹ <WH3027> by עֵ֣דֶן <WH5731> And next him [were] Eden וּ֠מִנְיָמִן <WH4509> and Miniamin וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> and Jeshua וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֜הוּ <WH8098> and Shemaiah אֲמַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH568> Amariah וּשְׁכַנְיָ֛הוּ <WH7935> and Shecaniah בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in the cities הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> in [their] set office לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> to give לַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> to their brethren בְּמַחְלְק֔וֹת <WH4256> courses כַּגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> as well to the great כַּקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> as to the small

מִלְּבַ֞ד <WH905> to הִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <WH3187> Beside their genealogy לִזְכָרִ֗ים <WH2145> of males מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old שָׁל֤וֹשׁ <WH7969> from three שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward לְכָל־ <WH3605> who הַבָּ֥א <WH935> [even] unto every one that entereth לְבֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִדְבַר־ <WH1697> portion י֣וֹם <WH3117> his daily בְּיוֹמ֑וֹ <WH3117> his daily לַעֲב֣וֹדָתָ֔ם <WH5656> for their service בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֖ם <WH4931> in their charges כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4256> according to their courses

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> הִתְיַחֵ֤שׂ <WH3188> genealogy הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וּלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4931> in their charges בְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4256> by their courses

וּלְהִתְיַחֵ֗שׂ <WH3188> genealogy בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all טַפָּ֧ם <WH2945> of all their little ones נְשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <WH802> their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1121> and their sons וּבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1323> and their daughters לְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole קָהָ֑ל <WH6951> through all the congregation כִּ֥י <WH3588> themselves בֶאֱמוּנָתָ֖ם <WH530> for in their set office יִתְקַדְּשׁוּ־ <WH6942> they sanctified קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> themselves in holiness

וְלִבְנֵי֩ <WH1121> Also of the sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> the priests בִּשְׂדֵ֨י <WH7704> [which were] in the fields מִגְרַ֤שׁ <WH4054> of the suburbs עָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> of their cities בְּכָל־ <WH3605> and every עִ֣יר <WH5892> in every several city וָעִ֔יר <WH5892> city אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נִקְּב֖וּ <WH5344> that were expressed בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <WH8034> by name לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give מָנ֗וֹת <WH4490> portions לְכָל־ <WH3605> to every זָכָר֙ <WH2145> to all the males בַּכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> among the priests וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> everyone הִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <WH3187> and to all that were reckoned by genealogies בַּלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> among the Levites

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> And thus did כָּזֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise יְחִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> throughout all Judah וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> and wrought הַטּ֤וֹב <WH2896> [that which was] good וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <WH3477> and right וְהָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> and truth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

וּבְכָֽל־ <WH3605> Every מַעֲשֶׂ֞ה <WH4639> And in every work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵחֵ֣ל ׀ <WH2490> that he began בַּעֲבוֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> in the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God וּבַתּוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> and in the law וּבַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> and in the commandments לִדְרֹ֖שׁ <WH1875> to seek לֵֽאלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָב֥וֹ <WH3824> [it] with all his heart עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> he did וְהִצְלִֽיחַ׃ <WH6743> and prospered פ
